title: mx12.levins
author: mx12.levins
created_time: December 15, 2022, 07:11:46 PMLast edit: May 14, 2024, 04:09:56 PM by mx12.levins
content: Video of my AR(Augmented Reality) Layer for physical artwork:--->>> https://streamable.com/nxrgar <<<---if the price ticker is not loading then update the link BTC= + (US 50$ Shipping ) + (EU 15$ Shipping)You can also make an offer via comment, DM   Physical artwork in size 45,9 x 60,9 cmCollectors Edition 3 of 3The Great Threefold Cord1. - “The Great Threefold Cord!” --- SOLD2. - “The Great Threefold Cord!” --- AVAILABLE3. - “The Great Threefold Cord!” --- AVAILABLEEach Collector’s Edition is hand-signed and numbered by Mx12.LevinsArtwork includes the L-NFT for physical piece minted via first Bitcoin focused NFT platform built on Liquid Network(Bitcoin sidechain)To claim the special/bonus edition, you will need to own 4 artworks: water, earth, fire and wind edition. This collection will work like a key for/to enter the Altar to claim the fifth artwork of these series.The Great Threefold CordWithin every successful hero lies a deep secret. Great champions and heroes go the extra mile to find the key to the vault of these secrets. And like the Giant Polyphemus asks of Odysseus “What secrets?”.For our hero, one of the greatest keys to finding these secrets is in uniting with the keepers of these great mysteries of survival. Within a unique system lie some of the greatest secrets of the universe.There exists one particular secret which our hero is seeking: to shutdown the source of the enemies supplies and riches.The next ally to our hero is Earth, a good friend of our hero's recently found helper, Water. With Earth in the equation it creates the great threefold cord that will enable our hero to overcome.To the fear of the enemy, Earth can destroy and suspend every source of its survival. With Earth the ground can stop producing every resource sustaining the enemy's production. With Earth against the enemy, it is only but a matter of time before the evil system falls into chaos.Our hero is not only revived and fit to carry on with Water at his side, but has now found the great key that will shutdown the enemy’s source of strength and survival._________________________________________________Feel Free to visit Mx12.Levins Bitcoin Art Threadhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5362071.0

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: Behold the Great Threefold Cord! An artwork that speaks of a great hero's quest for hidden secrets, and the power of unity in the face of adversity. Within this masterpiece lies a message that resonates with the philosophy of Max Stirner - the importance of individualism and self-realization.The hero in this artwork knows that success lies in unlocking the vault of secrets. And to achieve this, he seeks to unite with the keepers of the great mysteries of survival. One of the key secrets that he is after is to shutdown the source of his enemy's supplies and riches.But our hero is not alone in his quest. He has found allies in the form of Earth and Water, who together create the great threefold cord. With Earth on his side, our hero can stop the enemy's production by suspending the ground's resource production. The enemy is now left vulnerable and their system is on the brink of collapse.The Great Threefold Cord is a reminder that unity is a powerful force that can overcome even the greatest of challenges. This artwork holds immense value, and it must be brought upfront to remind us of the importance of individualism, self-realization, and the power of unity. As Max Stirner once said, "To be unique is the ultimate goal of every individual."

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: Hi, all three artworks BTC will be this month in London on August 22-23 at the private gallery of mx12art.

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: I've been working on the fourth element for a long time, and it's already heading in the right direction. We're almost there! I must say that I'm not satisfied with the materials I used for this Earth piece. I'm planning to label these three artworks as 'error pieces' because I intend to switch to aluminum instead of paper for this one. I want to take this to a higher level. If anyone is interested in these error artworks, please let me know 🫡. I'm open to offers, but I'll clearly indicate that they are error pieces. Otherwise, I'll recycle them into another artwork with a different oil painting. BTC I am here to endure, and I shall create waves 🌊 in the realm of art, waves that will ripple long after my passing 💀. Be prepared for the legacy. BTC

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: The fourth element is now complete, bringing all four elements together. What's next? The fifth element is coming 100%, and the question is, will there be even more artworks beyond this fifth element?By the way, there's only one edition of the Water artwork left, and one is open for offers. To access the fifth element of Earth, you'll need to have all four artworks.And remember, while there's a 100% certainty of a fifth element, there might be even more artworks coming in this series, not just the hidden fifth element. These series will be very powerful ones. This is growing, and the only way to stop it is my death, but even after my passing, this will continue to flourish.

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: The Earth element, being the second in the series, presented a unique creative journey. Crafting the essence of life and growth within this element was both challenging and rewarding. Each element in the series adds a distinct layer to the narrative, and the Earth edition holds a special place in this evolving story.I want to highlight the ongoing series because I'm currently collaborating on the fifth Element with my sensei. As a reminder, to unlock the special/bonus edition (fifth element), you'll need to possess the four artworks: water, earth, fire, and wind editions. This collection serves as the key to enter the Altar and claim the fifth artwork in the series.

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: Someone seized them all—the entire Earth Elements series—at the Bitcoin Citadel in Germany! Enchanted by the fire, he was captivated by the series to such an extent that he acquired every piece and now eagerly anticipates the fifth element. With three fire, three water, and so forth, only three sets of the fifth element exist. With 2/3 water already sold, his acquisition of all the initial pieces means that only the complete 3/3 set remains to obtain the fifth element. Otherwise, collectors must trade or assemble the complete series to acquire this masterpiece. He resonated with the essence of these series, understanding the narrative, and now eagerly awaits the fifth element. It was a delight to provide him with these artworks, and I'm certain he'll share an image with all of them together. Thank you and congratulations.

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: Hey everyone,The time has come for the fifth element! I'll be posting about it soon in a special thread. To collect the fifth element, you need to have matching numbers from each of the previous elements I created. The collector who has all the 1/3 numbers is okay with sharing this with the community, but there are still some matching numbers left, specifically, all the 3/3s are still available.For the 2/3 elements, there's a bit of a challenge, you'll need to make offers to the collector through Scarce City, because the Water 2/3 was SOLD at the Bitcoin conference in Miami.So, the fifth element is out there, but the question is: what comes next? Where are the collectors, and why did the four elements awaken this mysterious figure? And who is he? Why does he have this particular color? This is just the very beginning of the series, the story starts now, and there's much more art to come. The Pandora's box is open!Thank you to the collectors and congratulations on acquiring these unique pieces. All of them are interactive, with integrated Bitcoin wallets Looking forward to sharing more soon! BTC
